attributes.action: Allow Ukrainian passport holders in to the UK without a visa during crisis.
attributes.additional_details: The measures currently taken by the UK will have slow impact.  This action will directly benefit Ukrainians who are suffering now.
attributes.background: UK needs to demonstrate solidarity with the citizens of Ukraine and take genuine action to relieve the suffering of those fleeing the country.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
